Project Proponent: LANIN HOLDINGS PTY LTD and NINAL VENTURES PTY LTD
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Human-Induced Regeneration of a Permanent Even-Aged Native Forest - 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013
Project Description: This project establishes permanent native forests through assisted regeneration from in-situ seed sources (including rootstock and lignotubers) on land that was cleared of vegetation and where regrowth was suppressed for at least 10 years prior to the project having commenced.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
1/HU7, 1/HU8, 2/HU38, 4/HU52



This project is in the Paroo local government area.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: Lanin Holdings Pty Ltd, Ninal Ventures Pty Ltd
